content: Michael Stevens is the creator of the YouTube channel @Vsauce and co-hosts the podcast "The Rest is Science" with Hannah Fry.
Mereological Nihilism is a philosophical position discussed in relation to the question of existence, specifically whether composite objects truly exist.

The Bicameral Mind Theory is a concept related to free will, suggesting a historical state of human consciousness where one part of the mind experienced thoughts as external voices or divine commands.
